speaker: Clinician
text: So, just to clarify, you've been on the losartan for about a month now, right? How's that been going for you?
label: losartan usage inquiry

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, it's been about a month. I haven't had any issues with it, no cough like before. It's been a relief, honestly.
label: reports good losartan tolerance

speaker: Clinician
text: That's great to hear. And your blood pressure readings at home, are they staying within the range we talked about?
label: home BP readings inquiry

speaker: Patient
text: Mostly, yes. There was one time it was a bit high, but I think I was just stressed that day. Teaching can be... well, you know.
label: reports mostly normal BP

speaker: Clinician
text: Absolutely, I can imagine. Just keep monitoring it, and if you notice any consistent changes, let me know. Now, about the atorvastatin, any muscle aches or anything unusual?
label: atorvastatin side-effects inquiry

speaker: Patient
text: No, nothing like that. I take it at night like you suggested, and it seems to be working fine.
label: reports no atorvastatin issues

speaker: Clinician
text: Perfect. And, uh, just a quick note, if you ever plan to travel or anything, make sure you have enough medication with you. Sometimes refills can be tricky if you're out of town.
label: travel medication refill advice
